attributes.action: Hold a referendum on whether there should be another EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: Before an undemocratic decision is made to hold a second referendum, it is first necessary to find out public opinion on whether there should indeed  be one. Government is suppose to represent people, it had done that. Let the decision stand.
attributes.background: Most people think the parliament petition to hold another EU referendum is ridiculous. If a second referendum were to take place it would defeat the very purpose of democracy and undermine the 51% of the electorate that made an educated decision to leave the EU. This must be stopped
